snippet: Another 15 years of failure by nations to limit carbon emissions could make the situation virtually impossible to solve with current technologies, according to a draft United Nations report.
abstract: United Nations draft report says nations have so dragged their feet in battling climate change that situation has grown critical and risk of severe economic disruption is rising; experts say another 15 years of failure to limit carbon emissions could make problem virtually impossible to solve with current technologies.
lead_paragraph: Another 15 years of failure by nations to limit carbon emissions could make the situation virtually impossible to solve with current technologies, according to a draft United Nations report.
